parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: A prolonged form of a primary verb; to 'know' in a great variety of applications and with many implications.
Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A test, trial, what is genuine. Neuter of a presumed derivative of dokime; a testing; by implication, trustworthiness.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 2nd Person Plural
str2: You. The person pronoun of the second person singular; thou.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From kata and ergazomai; to work fully, i.e. Accomplish; by implication, to finish, fashion.
Endurance, steadfastness, patient waiting for. From hupomeno; cheerful endurance, constancy.
